controller.editor

Interface PatternEditor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GridEditor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridEditorImpl

    public interface PatternEditor
extends GridEditor
    Represents a GridEditor able to place, show preview and rotate patterns of Conway's Game of Life.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPatternToPlace(Matrix<Status> statusMatrix)
      Starts the placement of the given pattern into the grid.
      boolean isPlacingModeOn()
      Returns true if there is a pattern that is waiting to be placed.
      void placeCurrentPattern(int row, int column)
      Ends the placement of the current pattern in the given position, permanently.
      void removePatternToPlace()
      Removes, if possible, the current pattern that is waiting to be placed.
      void rotateCurrentPattern(int hits)
      Rotates 90 degrees clockwise the pattern.
      void showPreview(int row, int column)
      Shows a preview of the current pattern in the given position.

      • Methods inherited from interface controller.editor.GridEditor

        changeSizes, clean, draw, getGeneration, hit, isEnabled, setEnabled

    • Method Detail

      • showPreview

        void showPreview(int row,
                 int column)
        Shows a preview of the current pattern in the given position.
        Parameters:
        row - the row
        column - the column
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no pattern that waits to be placed

      • addPatternToPlace

        void addPatternToPlace(Matrix<Status> statusMatrix)
        Starts the placement of the given pattern into the grid.
        Parameters:
        statusMatrix - that describes the Status of the cells

      • placeCurrentPattern

        void placeCurrentPattern(int row,
                         int column)
        Ends the placement of the current pattern in the given position, permanently.
        Parameters:
        row - the row
        column - the column
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no pattern or is invoked out of placing mode

      • isPlacingModeOn

        boolean isPlacingModeOn()
        Returns true if there is a pattern that is waiting to be placed.
        Returns:
        true only if a pattern is waiting

      • rotateCurrentPattern

        void rotateCurrentPattern(int hits)
        Rotates 90 degrees clockwise the pattern.
        Parameters:
        hits - is the number of times the mouse button has been clicked
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is no pattern that waits to be placed

      • removePatternToPlace

        void removePatternToPlace()
        Removes, if possible, the current pattern that is waiting to be placed.
